name: Orb Spider in Outer-Space!
description:
Use the Orb Spider's special abilities to puzzle-platform your way through the inter-stellar levels!

Controls (remappable in options)

  • move - arrows
  • jump - space
  • restart - R
  • pause - Escape
  • close pop-ups - jump/enter/space

Attributions

  • space skyboxes - https://opengameart.org/content/space-skyboxes-0
  • font - https://www.dafont.com/space-3.font 
  • spider - https://opengameart.org/content/spider-3d 
  • wormhole - https://godotshaders.com/shader/wormhole/
  • orb glow - https://github.com/defz0/GODOT/tree/main/glow
  • music & sfx - https://www.zapsplat.com/
  • testers - llxu, jig, thbdk
